title: Content Intelligence Web action
description: Web action in the form of web events and their context.

type.title: Action type
type.description: Type of action. The action can be user generated (click, expand) or dynamic (offer loaded).

meta:enum.click: Click event has occured on the page. It can be link click or click on a web element.
meta:enum.expand: Expand event occured on container web elements (accordion)
meta:enum.collapse: Collapse event occured on container web elements (accordion)
meta:enum.offer: Personalized content (offer) was dynamically loaded in DOM

element.title: Element
element.description: The target element metadata. For 'clickEvent' this is the target element. For 'offerLoaded' this could be the targeted element or empty if the targeted element is defined in the 'context'

context.title: Context
context.description: The web context of the actioned element. For 'cliclEvent' this represents the parent element and its siblings. For 'offerLoaded' this represents the targeted element with offers
